allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add profile settings, wood count filter, and consolidate docker-compose

Features:
- Add profile dropdown menu with avatar in navbar
- Add profile settings page (change name, email, password)
- Add wood count field to picture sets for filtering
- Add date and wood count filters in CategoryView
- Remove filter sidebar from Browse page (moved to category view)

Backend:
- Add PUT /api/auth/profile endpoint for updating name/email
- Add email validation and duplicate check
- Add woodCount field to PictureSet model
- Support woodCount filtering in category pictures API

Docker:
- Consolidate docker-compose.yml with both postgres and backend
- Use internal Docker network for database connection
- Remove external PostgreSQL port binding for security

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix deployment: update deploy script and remove deprecated docker version

- Add --legacy-peer-deps to npm ci for React 19 compatibility
- Simplify deploy script to use consolidated docker-compose.yml
- Remove deprecated ''version'' attribute from docker-compose.yml

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
